boys.name: RATHBONE BLAZER
boys.summary: Occasion wear: sorted. The Rathbone Blazer is a traditionally tailored jacket in all-over check. Pair with the matching trousers for a refined aesthetic.

boys.name: MORTON SHERPA-LINED DENIM JACKET
boys.summary: This is the Morton, a new trucker jacket shaped to a relaxed fit. Sherpa lining, it'll keep you warm. The body is black with light distressing throughout.
description: This style uses 50% less water in washing and processing than conventional methods

boys.name: Milo Leather Biker Jacket
boys.summary: The Milo Biker. Made from soft lamb leather. With biker jacket details. A ticket pocket. And hem loops. Just add the motorbike.
description: Model is 6'2.5/187cm and is wearing size Medium

boys.name: SURVEY LEATHER BLAZER
boys.summary: The Survey Leather Blazer takes instant styling into its own hands - two layers worked into one means no styling is necessary. Rugged, waxed goat suede contrasts the woolen double layer perfectly.
description: Model is 6'2.5/188cm and is wearing size Medium

boys.name: MODE MERINO HENLEY
boys.summary: Henley. But not as you know it. The Mode Merino Henley T-Shirt. Featuring a three button placket. And our hallmark Ramskull embroidered on the chest.
description: The dyeing process of the yarn used to make this style uses 40% less water than conventional methods

RWS certified wool (CU 870616). The Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) is an industry tool that ensures the wool comes from farms where the land has been managed and the sheep have been treated responsibly - find out more
Model is 6'2.5/188cm and is wearing size Medium
